Controlled Industry Terms

The following terms are the only industry and industry_sector names that the API will accept:

Industry Industry Sector
**Aerospace & Defense** Aircraft & Parts
Airport & Ground Support Equipment
Aviation Services
Defense Industry Equipment
**Agribusiness** Agricultural Chemicals
Agricultural Machinery & Equipment
Agricultural Products
Agricultural Services
Forestry & Woodworking Machinery
Lawn & Garden Equipment
Veterinary Medicine Equipment & Supplies
**Arts, Entertainment & Media** Artwork
Audio/Visual Equipment
Books & Periodicals
Film & Video Production
Musical Instruments
Photographic Equipment
Printing & Graphic Arts Equipment
**Automotive & Ground Transportation** Automobiles, Light Trucks & Vans
Automotive Parts & Service Equipment
Railroad Equipment
Transportation Services (Non-Aviation)
Trucks, Trailers & Busses
**Business & Professional Services** Advertising Services
Architecture & Engineering Services
Education & Training Services
Employment Services
General Science & Technology
General Services
Management Consulting Services
Operations & Maintenance Services
Trade Promotion Services
**Chemicals** Chemical Production Machinery
Industrial Chemicals
**Construction, Building & Heavy Equipment** Air Conditioning & Refrigeration Equipment
Building Products
Construction Equipment
**Consumer Goods** Consumer Electronics
Cosmetics & Toiletries
Furniture
Giftware
Housewares
Jewelry
Pet Foods & Supplies
Sporting Goods & Recreational Equipment
Toys & Games
**Energy & Mining** Coal
Electrical Power Systems
Mining Industry Equipment
Oil & Gas Field Machinery
Oil, Gas & Mineral Production & Exploration Services
**Environmental Industries** Pollution Control Equipment
Renewable Energy Equipment
Water Resources Equipment & Services
**Financial Services** Accounting Services
Insurance Services
Investment Services
Leasing Services
**Food Processing & Packaging** Food Processing & Packaging Equipment
Marine Fisheries Products (Seafood)
Processed Foods
**Healthcare, Biotechnology & Pharmaceuticals** Biotechnology
Dental Equipment
Health Care Services
Medical Equipment
Pharmaceuticals
**Industrial Machinery & Equipment** Business Equipment (Non-Computer)
Electronic Components

Laboratory Scientific Instruments

Packaging Equipment
Process Controls - Industrial

Computer Software

Electronic Commerce

Website Feedback | USA.gov | FOIA | Privacy Policy | Disclaimer | Information Quality Guidelines

The International Trade Administration, U.S. Department of Commerce, manages this global trade site to provide access to ITA information on promoting trade and investment, strengthening the competitiveness of U.S. industry, and ensuring fair trade and compliance with trade laws and agreements. External links to other Internet sites should not be construed as an endorsement of the views or privacy policies contained therein.
